chav1961.purelib.ui

Class UIUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.ui.UIUtils

  • public class UIUtils
extends Object

    This is utility class to support useful methods for UI.

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    CreoleWriter

    • Method Detail

      • cre2Html

        public static String cre2Html(char[] source)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException,
                              IOException

        Convert Creole-based character array to HTML string

        Parameters:
        source - creole-based character array. Can't be null or empty array
        Returns:
        html converted
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when argument is null or empty array
        IOException - on any errors in the Creole content

      • cre2Html

        public static String cre2Html(String source)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException,
                              IOException

        Convert Creole-based string to HTML string

        Parameters:
        source - creole-based string. Can't be null or empty
        Returns:
        html converted
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when argument is null or empty
        IOException - on any errors in the Creole content

      • collectFields

        public static <LabelType,FieldType> void collectFields(Localizer localizer,
                                                       Class<?> clazz,
                                                       Object instance,
                                                       List<LabelAndField<LabelType,FieldType>> list,
                                                       UIUtils.CreateLabelCallback<LabelType> labelConstructor,
                                                       UIUtils.CreateFieldCallback<FieldType> fieldConstructor)
                                                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                       NullPointerException,
                                                       SyntaxException,
                                                       LocalizationException,
                                                       ContentException

        Build editable field list by class definitions. All field marked with format annotations will be incuded in the list

        Type Parameters:
        LabelType - type of label before field
        FieldType - type of the field
        Parameters:
        localizer - Localizer to use for label building
        clazz - class description to parse
        instance - class instance to set initial values. If null, initial value settings will be skipped
        list - list was build. If the parameter is not empty, new field will be appended into tail. No checking for duplicated names will be executed.
        labelConstructor - constructor to create label for the given field
        fieldConstructor - UI field instance to create
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when any nulls (except instance) will be detected
        IllegalArgumentException - when any errors were detected
        SyntaxException - in any errors in the Format annotations
        LocalizationException - on any localization errors
        ContentException - on any other errors
